name: Don't Melt (TP_Ski)
description:
(Press mouse button if there is a black screen when entering fullscreen)

Control a snowman trying to rid its world of flaming monsters.

Enemy waves get harder as you play.

The flaming monsters are heating up the world, so watch your frost levels!

Extinguish the monsters, and replenish your frost,  by hitting them with snowballs.

Your resources are limited so explore the infinite map.

---

wasd - move

left click - shoot

right click - look

shift - sprint

*Your frost decreases over time and decreases quicker while sprinting*

---

This is my first ever game and is pretty short. Only one enemy is in the game for now and the leveling up system may be upgraded in the future.

Thanks for playing!
